name: axios
text:
Trump pardoned Jon Ponder, a convicted bank robber turned activist, ahead of Ponder's Tuesday night appearance at the Republican National Convention.

https://t.co/PXK2dlWorP

name: axios
text:
Mary Ann Mendoza, who was scheduled to address the RNC on Tuesday, was pulled from the program hours before it began after she retweeted an anti-Semitic rant on Twitter, which has since been deleted.

https://t.co/AblFkv71XL

name: axios
text:
Former Planned Parenthood employee Abby Johnson used her speech at the RNC to advocate for the pro-life movement and said the organization's "abortion facilities are strategically located in minority neighborhoods." 
https://t.co/lOuavnEQr2
